text: Vernon Lorden Shaw (May 13, 1930 â€“ December 2, 2013) was the 5th President of Dominica. He took office on October 6, 1998, following the expiration of President Crispin Sorhaindo's single five-year term. Shaw left office on October 1, 2003, and was succeeded by Nicholas Liverpool. He died on December 2, 2013 from a heart attack, aged 83. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Presidents of Dominica
title: Vernon Shaw
